replies.author: dogeop
replies.txt_content:
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
    at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
    at org.spigotmc.ActivationRange.activateEntities(ActivationRange.java:125)
    at net.minecraft.world.World.updateEntities(World.java:2019)
    at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.updateEntities(WorldServer.java:742)
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.updateTimeLightAndEntities(MinecraftServer.java:913)
    at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.updateTimeLightAndEntities(DedicatedServer.java:473)
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.tick(MinecraftServer.java:783)
    at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:637)

CME， 另外楼上不要推荐catserver，小心后门木马，以前还爆出过格盘。
这种崩服只是偶发的，用就完事了，如果实在是不想蹦清去源码把所有hashmap改成concurrentHashMap

replies.author: 翎澈Official
replies.txt_content:
首先更新一下你的Java
如果还是不行就别用多线程版的CatServer（换个版本）
